alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock; Morgan; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:25AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morgan, northeastern Putnam, northwestern Hancock and southeastern Greene Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 125 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Reynolds at Lake Oconee, or 8 miles south of Greensboro, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Union Point, White Plains, Siloam, Phoenix, Reynolds at Lake Oconee, Liberty, Rockville, Veazey, Parks Mill, Harmony and Shoulderbone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
